about_the_game:
Food Gallery

This Food-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image looks delicious and nutritious!

Create your own culinary delights with this DLC.

Contents

The Food gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Coffee
  • Toaster
  • Groceries
  • Farmers Market
  • Cheese Board
  • Fine Dining
  • Fruit Bowl
  • Hotdog
  • Ice Cream
  • Asian Restaurant
  • Taco
  • Fast Food
  • BBQ
  • Biscuits
  • Avacado Toast
  • Restaurant
  • Sushi
  • Takeout
  • Fridge
  • Pizza
  • Chef

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
